message: Accept this generous offer and we can call it a day!
You'll get peanuts if you don't accept this!
Don't be greedy, Bob! Let's split it fairly!
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'm not going to let you get away with a pittance!
I'm still willing to compromise, Bob. Let's make a deal!
You're really running out of options, Alice. Don't expect me to go easy on you!
